Uses of Package
com.orchestranetworks.workflow

Packages that use com.orchestranetworks.workflow
com.orchestranetworks.ui Provides the capability to create custom user interface components that are integrated within EBX5.  
com.orchestranetworks.workflow Provides classes and interfaces for implementing workflow processes and invoking them.  
 

Classes in com.orchestranetworks.workflow used by com.orchestranetworks.ui
WorkItemKey
          Identifies a work item.
 

Classes in com.orchestranetworks.workflow used by com.orchestranetworks.workflow

          This interface is used as the context for ConditionBean evaluation.

          This interface is used as the context for Condition evaluation.
CreationWorkItemSpec
          This class specifies the properties of a work item to be created.
DataContext
          The data context is a container for variables which must be kept during the whole process.
MailSpec
          This interface provides the possibility to send mails in a workflow context.
MailSpec.NotificationType
          Indicates the type of the notification.

          This interface is used as a generic context for workflow execution.
